mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FAVORITES WHERE USER_UID = #{userUid} AND PRODUCT_UID = #{product-uid}
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_UID, DIRECTORY_NAME, PHYSICAL_FILE_NAME FROM PRODUCTS INNER JOIN PRODUCT_IMGS ON PRODUCTS.PRODUCT_UID = PRODUCT_IMGS.PRODUCT_UID WHERE EXPOSURE_ORDER = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 8
